examples.korean: He was buried in a pyramid tomb. 발음듣기 그는 피라미드 형태의 묘에 묻혔다. Neungyule
examples.english: He was buried in a pyramid tomb. 발음

examples.korean: Then, they go to their ancestors’ graves. 발음듣기 그런 뒤 조상의 묘를 찾아간다. Neungyule
examples.english: Then, they go to their ancestors’ graves. 발음

examples.korean: He built Hwaseong Fortress to guard the tomb. 발음듣기 그는 이 묘를 수호하기 위해 화성을 세웠다. Neungyule
examples.english: He built Hwaseong Fortress to guard the tomb. 발음

examples.korean: We paid our respects to soldiers who died in battle. 발음듣기 우리는 전사자들의 묘에 꽃을 올려 놓고 경의를 표했다. Neungyule
examples.english: We paid our respects to soldiers who died in battle. 발음

examples.korean: Strange to relate, asteroids will hit the Earth. 발음듣기 이상한[묘한] 이야기지만, 소행성이 지구와 충돌할 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Strange to relate, asteroids will hit the Earth. 발음
